title: AVG Internet Security Business Edition 2016 v2016.0.7161
description:

Our AVG Internet Security Business Edition reduces the chances of that happening by protecting your business PCs, network, file server and email against the latest online threats.

Start protecting your business today:

- Quick to download

Get back to what your business really needs you for:

Online security threats are serious. Hackers, malware and spam can sneak in and disrupt your business, costing you time, money and maybe even customers. Worst case, they can take down your business completely. Our AVG Internet Security Business Edition reduces the chances of that happening by protecting your business PCs, network, file server and email against the latest online threats.

AVG Internet Security Business Edition Key Features:

- More powerful than ever
Our latest edition works even harder and smarter for you. It comes with an accelerated scanning engine, advanced encryption for your critical folders and files, and secure deletion of unwanted files.

- Guards against the latest threats
Better protection against even the newest malware thanks to cloud-based Real-Time Outbreak Detection and proactive AI Detection. Our network antivirus helps your employees work with confidence by actively checking web pages before they click through and alerting them if it detects anything suspicious.

- Encrypt & password-protect business confidential file
Our data safe technology helps encrypt and store your valuable company documents, or other files onto a password-protected virtual disk on your PC.

- Permanently delete unwanted files!
Our advanced File Shredder securely deletes files to help prevent unintended recovery.

- Your first line of defense
Our firewall helps keep your business moving because it helps protect against online security threats like spam, viruses, hackers and malware.

- Surf, search and download with confidence
Our LinkscannerÂ® Surf-Shield checks web pages before they open in your browser and displays a safety rating in the search engine results to help you surf the web with more confidence.

- Send and receive messages with confidence
Our email server security scans your email and removes suspicious content, code and infected attachments.

- Shields passwords and credit card numbers
Being able to conduct online transactions safely shouldnÃ¢Â€â„¢t be a worry. Our Anti-Spyware helps protect your identity from spyware and adware that tracks personal information.

- Faster control from a single location
Remote management lets your administrator remotely install, update, and configure AVG across your PC devices â€“ and entire computer network â€“ from a single location. AVG automatically updates itself too, so you can always be sure your business is protected against the latest threats.
